casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

September, 1955.

(September 14, 1955.) Mandel G. Shulman, as Administrator of the Estate of Morris Shulman, Deceased, Respondent, v. First Bank & Trust Company of Utica et al., Appellants.

Present — McCurn, P. J., Vaughan, Kimball and Wheeler, JJ. [See ante, p. 23.]
